title: @Reav3, can we expect the update on the next VGU projects soon?
body: And if so, will we also get the runners up to follow those two projects? Very excited to see who will follow Galio.

replies.body: The blog about whats next for ChampUp should be soon, sometime next week  I believe. I won't be going over runner-ups in it though. Happy to talk about it after the blog goes out though/ Talking about it now would make it too obvious who the next 2 are :P
Well I mean the Warwick team kinda spoiled the surprise for one of them, providing they weren't pulling our collective legs.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EfrXBasU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-25T19:13:47.039+0000)
>
> Well I mean the Warwick team kinda spoiled the surprise for one of them, providing they weren't pulling our collective legs.

Can you remind me? I missed that.
Urgot was hinted to be next by CertainlyT during a live stream of new Warwick during PBE.

and hes not the only one who brought up urgot

I wanna know who the second one will be. irelia? Evelynn? mordekaiser? 

I think eve needs it pretty bad but morde and irelia are cooler to me thematically.
I would want a Morde VGU so badly. He's supposed to be the Sauron/Morgoth of the League world but he's short and walks hilariously. He needs to be *big* and *scary*.
they also need to do something art wise especially to make him not just a sauron clone
must be nunu imo, he is the one who suffer the most when the other can at least be succesfull i their lane
Ahh Actually, I think he just already "revealed" it not "hinted".
finger crossed for either yordle unification stuff or nunu/whilump power up :D
Swain! Riot Gods hear my pleas for a VGU. I do understand how tough he would be though, having 2 forms to work on though. Still I'd feed whats left of my soul to Beatrice for it!
Hmm, Urgot was likely next no matter what. Eve is likely the second, but I'd sacrifice a few chickens to get Swain in her slot (bow chicka wow wow).
